column2: During potion creation, you can make a DC 12 Insight check to alter the Spell that acts as the Potion's effect to something you did not use the ingredients for.
column3: During potion creation, you can make a DC 8 Insight check to alter the Spell that acts as the Potion's effect to something you did not use the ingredients for.
column4: You can make any Potion from any ingredients.
